settings.title: DESIGNED IN MELBOURNE
settings.content: Exclusively designed in-house and committed to the slow fashion movement

Eliya The Label is an Australian fashion label synonymous with ornate, ethereal, yet affordable luxury. Our mission is to design empowering statement fashion pieces for women across the globe who aren't afraid to be noticed.

settings.title: BECOME A VIP
settings.content: Subscribe to ELIYA THE LABEL and receive $20 AUD off your first order, plus early access to sales, new arrivals and more.
